siteproof.value: SiteProof v2 - Construction inspection and quality management platform using Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and monorepo structure with pnpm workspaces
NCR creation foreign key constraint errors fixed, deployment on Vercel, Redis connection issues in production

Fixed NCR foreign key constraint errors by: 1) Client-side filtering of empty UUID fields in NcrForm.tsx, 2) Server-side validation in /api/ncrs/route.ts to remove empty strings before database insert, 3) Added defensive checks for contractor_id and assigned_to fields
